description: Main entry point of a Flutter application, defines app structure with a home page displaying a loading message and progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, sets theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class handling the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a scaffold with an app bar and centered loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the app with MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and MyHomePage widgets.
